class.name: ObjectBufferConsumer

javadoc.text: Target of a streaming <tt>ObjectBuffer</tt> into which data is flushed upon buffer overflow.
javadoc.author: wolfgang.hoschek@cern.ch

javadoc.text: Adds all elements of the specified list to the receiver.
javadoc.param: list the list of which all elements shall be added.
